document.full_text: the founder of one of pakistan's most violent islamist militant groups has told muslims to be heartened by the death of osama bin laden, as his "martyrdom" would not go in vain, a spokesman for the group said on tuesday.
document.title: islamist militant leads prayers for bin laden in pakistan
lines_and_colors: the founder of one of pakistan's most violent islamist militant groups has told muslims to be heartened by the death of osama bin laden, as his "martyrdom" would not go in vain, a spokesman for the group said on tuesday.
